meta.description: Determine the number of ramen and fries packs to minimize sodium intake while meeting calorie and protein requirements.

sets.name: MEALS
sets.description: Types of meals the salesman can eat

params.name: calories
params.description: Calories per pack of each meal

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein in grams per pack of each meal

params.name: sodium
params.description: Sodium in mg per pack of each meal

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of packs of each meal to eat

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 3000 calories are consumed

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 80 grams of protein are consumed

constraints.name: ramen_limit
constraints.description: At most 30% of meals can be ramen
